recipe.title: Slow-Cooker Apple Spice Cobbler Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 20 oz ; apple pie filling, 2 cans ; (565 g)
vanilla ice cream, optional, for serving

steps.step: Combine the Apple Pie filling, cake mix, and butter in the slow cooker
Bake on High for 2 to 2.5 hours
Server a la mode with vanilla ice cream or your favorite whipped cream.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Combine the Apple Pie filling, cake mix, and butter in the slow cooker
Bake on High for 2 to 2.5 hours
Server a la mode with vanilla ice cream or your favorite whipped cream.
